message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. However, $18,000 is above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $12,000 at this time.
I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $12,000. Let me see what I can do. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $15,000.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $15,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $13,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product and my budget.

I understand that $13,000 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $14,000. I'm willing to give you a slight discount from my previous offer, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. Let's meet at $14,000.
